description.raw:
This pull request updates `examples/hxs_requester.c` to be more illustrative of the sim API functionality. It is based on @gerkey's Matlab example, `matlab/hxs_example.m`, with a few omissions here and there.

I also add an example of using `hxs_contacts` in the Matlab example, and a line showing how to move the arm.

Testing `hxs_contacts` requires a change to the `hxsContactPoints` protobuf message, else octave will crash due to a protobuf exception when the example is run.

The Matlab example updates will be an integral part of the [upcoming sim API tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=haptix_sim_api&branch=haptix_sim_api).
description.html:
This pull request updates examples/hxs_requester.c to be more illustrative of the sim API functionality. It is based on @gerkey's Matlab example, matlab/hxs_example.m, with a few omissions here and there.

I also add an example of using hxs_contacts in the Matlab example, and a line showing how to move the arm.

Testing hxs_contacts requires a change to the hxsContactPoints protobuf message, else octave will crash due to a protobuf exception when the example is run.

The Matlab example updates will be an integral part of the upcoming sim API tutorial.

title.raw: Changed hxs_requester.c to match matlab example
